body_html:
@jart
I have run my codes again, and when the training cluster hung, I used gdb to attach the server and worker processes. The trace back is stored in log files.
ps.log.txt
worker1.log.txt
worker0.log.txt

body:
@jart 
I have run my codes again, and when the training cluster hung, I used gdb to attach the server and worker processes. The trace back is stored in log files.
[ps.log.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1272757/ps.log.txt)
[worker1.log.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1272755/worker1.log.txt)
[worker0.log.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1272756/worker0.log.txt)
